title: The Bible Unearthed (2002) by Israel Finkelstein
description:
The Bible Unearthed - Archaeology's New Vision of Ancient Israel and the Origin of Its Sacred Texts (2002) by Neil Asher Silberman & Israel Finkelstein.pdf

In this groundbreaking work that sets apart fact and legend, authors Finkelstein and Silberman use significant archeological discoveries to provide historical information about biblical Israel and its neighbors.

In this iconoclastic and provocative work, leading scholars Israel Finkelstein and Neil Asher Silberman draw on recent archaeological research to present a dramatically revised portrait of ancient Israel and its neighbors.
